cause.description:
Broadway Cares is an organization with two important goals: 1. Giving grants to service organizations that deal with HIV/AIDS. 2. Increase awareness & understanding of HIV/AIDS
They are a leading group in the country that gives grants and does fundraising for the HIV/AIDS cause.
1. Giving grants to service organizations that deal with HIV/AIDS.
2. Increase awareness & understanding of HIV/AIDS
cause.mission: mobilize the resources of the entertainment industry to raise funds to provide grants to AIDS service organizations and promote awareness of HIV/AIDS issues.
cause.name: Broadway Cares :: The Fight Against AIDS
